item.title: Eating hare's meat
item.summary: A certain small portion of the flesh of the Hare is refrained from by the Bushmen. In English, after /han≠kass’o (L VIII.27. 8398 rev.). The people believe this flesh is from the days when the Hare was formerly a person.
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book VIII-27
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)
